info.name: TAPI Subclient Onboard Offboard With Name and ID

item.name: Login

request.description:
Description

(starting with V11 RTM) Commvault REST APIs support token-based authentication via the Authtoken request header. The POST Login API is used to retrieve the authentication token. Once obtained, the authentication token must be inserted into the Authtoken header for all requests. Note: The authentication token expires after 30 minutes of inactivity. [_More Details_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=features/rest_api/rest_api_authentication.htm)

item.name: Client Id

request.description:
Description

This operation returns a client Id

 

Request Parameters

Name

Description

clientName

Name of the client(URL Encoded)

agent

Name of the Agent(URL Encoded)

instanceName

Instance Name(URL Encoded)

backupset

Backupset Name(URL Encoded)

subclient

Subclient Name(URL Encoded)
[_For all Agent Names_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=45467.htm#o99081)

item.name: Subclient Id

request.description:
Description

This operation returns a subclient id.

originalRequest.description:
This operation returns a list of subclients for a client.

[_More Details_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=features/rest_api/operations/get_subclient.htm)

Description

This operation returns a list of subclients for a client. [_More Details_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=features/rest_api/operations/get_subclient.htm)

item.name: User Id

request.description:
Description

This operation returns properties of a User.

response.name: User

item.name: Remove Security Owner Association If Any

request.description:
Description

This operation updates the security associations for an entity. The entity, role, and user form a security association. [_More Details_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=95854.htm)

response.name: Update Security Association to a Plan

item.name: Subclient Onboard by ID
Verify Plan Created and Get PlanId

request.description:
Description

This operation returns a list of Plans.

response.name: Get Plan With Type and SubType

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

item.name: Verify if Client Owner is Set

request.description:
Description

This operation returns the properties associated with a client. [_More Details_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=features/rest_api/operations/get_client_properties.htm)

response.name: Client Properties

item.name: Verify Role Associated To User

request.description:
Description

This operation returns the properties associated with a user. [_More Details_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=features/rest_api/operations/get_user_properties.htm)

Information returned with different levels:

1: ListOnly 10: Basic Properties 30: All Properties 40: Returns associatedUserGroups, associatedExternalUserGroups, SecurityAssociations + all other properties 50: Returns associatedUserGroups, associatedExternalUserGroups, SecurityAssociations, UserSecurity + all other properties
